artist: Artist: Alfred Jarry; Publisher: Théâtre de l'Oeuvre, Paris
creditline: The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books
description: written text in ULC and along left edge; printed text at right edge; image of stylized heavy-set figure at right with leaves on face and head, with a twisted PL arm carrying a sack and holding a whip or torch in PR hand; two kneeling men with hands folded in prayer at left; burning building at center with rotund balloon-like stylized bat or bird hovering over it; black on tan paper
medium: Lithograph on tan paper; folded sheet
portfolio: From The Beraldi Album of Theatre Programs
provenance: (Eric G. Carlson Fine Prints & Drawings, New York, N.Y.); sold to MIA, 2010.
title: Program for King Ubu (Ubu Roi)
